channel.title: [317]In Game Moderator Crowns[317]
channel.description:
Hey i was just wondering if anyone knew how to add new crowns on a 317 server
like a new player rights where it gives you a green crown if your a forum moderator
i couldnt find a guide but if i missed one, if someone could post a link that would be great or just tell me how to do it right on this thread, thank you
~D

item.title: [317]In Game Moderator Crowns[317]

aim uk2fl
aim might be uk2fl121 as well try both and i will resolve this problem[/quote]

Got an Msn?

Also anyone else who can help?
